rooms.description: Main entrance with a traditional Kerala-style colonnade and wooden doors.
Spacious living area adorned with local motifs and natural materials.
Dining space integrated within the living room area for a seamless flow.
Modern yet traditional kitchen design with Vastu compliant layout ensuring eastward placement for energy and auspiciousness.
Functional bathroom with modern fixtures, placed in a corner aligning with local building norms.
Master bedroom oriented towards the north-east to harness positive energy as per Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and adherence to traditional spatial planning.
Library space with built-in shelves, designed as a quiet retreat for reading and study. Placed in a corner that ensures minimal disturbance and proper ventilation.
